name: raffishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not following usual social standards of behaviour or appearance, especially in a careless and attractive way: He was a complex man, torn between raffishness and conformity. There was a certain raffishness about him. See
raffish
More examplesFewer examplesI was prone to a certain amount of raffishness which would have been frowned upon by my more sober colleagues.He threw himself onto a sofa with an air of raffishness.His acting emphasizes the hero's raffishness.
